entry.title: The Good I’ll Do
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,448Chapters: 1/24Kudos: 3

Summary: “I leave in a week,” Eddie said quietly. “Minimum Five-month deployment.”The spoon clattered against the counter, the sharp sound cutting through the air. Buck’s jaw tightened, his eyes narrowing with something too tangled to be just anger. “Five months? You were supposed to be done in three. No more deployments…We were supposed to finally settle down. Put down some roots. Be on the same fucking continent for more than a few months at a time.”Or, They survived deployments and the kind of chaos only Buck could attract. Falling in love should’ve been the easy part. Now married and raising Christopher, they’ve finally built the family they once only dreamed about…except Eddie’s been deployed again, and long-distance is proving tougher than any mission.

entry.title: Where The Lavender Grows Wild
entry.summary:
Author: rose_quartz_queen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,523Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 22

Summary: "From his vantage point on the museum steps, Buck can see Eddie for a little longer than Eddie can see him, and he watches as Eddie scans the crowd. Buck’s heart flutters in his chest, feeling like it's going to explode. He can still go home, he thinks, he can still leave. If he turns around right now, Buck can go home before Eddie even knows he was there. He can pack up his locker at work and leave, just like he did in Pennsylvania and South America. "After a not-quite-unexpected kiss, Buck and Eddie finally begin their journey as more than friends. However, as the pair get to know each other in a new way, Buck must finally come to terms with and heal from the past he has worked so hard to bury.A slow-burn fic exploring what it means to fall in love and find happiness after trauma.

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 77,989Chapters: 19/23Kudos: 413

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface. AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: With Great Fire
entry.summary:
Author: Taylorm1509

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 138,173Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 104

Summary: Evan Buckley didn’t break bones the way other kids did. He learned that in eighth grade, when he fell off the roof of the gym during a dumb dare. Landed on the concrete. Hard. Everyone thought he’d shattered something. He got up. Winded. Bruised. No break. Not even a sprain. The nurse said he was lucky. Buck knew better.He didn’t feel lucky. He felt wrong. Like there was a blueprint for how a person was supposed to work, and he’d been printed just slightly off-axis. Because it wasn’t the first time.ORAn AU where Buck is the Spider-Man of this universe. Getting his powers as his parents were desperate to heal Daniel, they sought help beyond conventional medicine. An experimental treatment that might jumpstart Daniel’s immune system through enhanced gene therapy using a matched donor’s stem cells. Create a sibling. A perfect donor child, whose DNA could be pre-modified to produce regenerative stem cells and enhanced immunity. Buck was this perfect donor child.Buck learns how to juggle being Spider-Man and a firefighter. He also faces the looming threat of Connors, who is relentlessly pursuing him. Meanwhile, the rest of the 118 are beginning to piece together the mystery of his secret identity.

Summary: Where Buck and Eddie learn that giving up isn't synonymous with weakness.Eddie finally opens up, and Buck welcomes him cautiously. He’s already been hurt too much, and there’s no way he’s going to let Eddie hurt him again. Their balance is fragile but is heading toward a calmer relationship.Everything starts to shake again when Abby shows up, determined to win Buck back. Eddie is torn between jealousy, anger, and fear. Their relationship gets tense... but neither of them is willing to give up. entry.summary:
Author: 1dalso

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,806Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 26

Summary: It’s as if time slows down, or the world comes to an abrupt halt.Not only is this guy probably the same age as Buck, but fuck. This might just be the hottest guy he’s ever seen— and he likes girls."Phew! That’s one fine man,” whistles Hen from the kitchen, sidling up besides Chimney, “And I like girls.”Buck eagerly nods in agreement, because who’s he kidding, he likes girls too. But hey, attraction is each to their own, and he finds whatever this is, quite attractive.He can unpack that later. Preferably at home. Maybe with a beer. Or two.—Buck and Eddie meet for the first time on the cusp of Buck's bisexual awakening. How much of the newbie, Eddie Diaz, can Buck handle before he takes matters into his own hands... and maybe gives those matters a kiss on the mouth?

entry.title: i was a kid, but i wasn't clueless
entry.summary:
Author: BuddieDreams (fangirlingtodeath513)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,913Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 107

Summary: Adriana Diaz has never liked her parents. She grew up watching them mistreat her siblings, her absolute favorite people in the world, and watched both of them be crushed under the weight of their parents' judgement. So when her nephew shows up unexpectedly and declares that he's staying in Texas for an undetermined amount of time, Adriana decides it's time to step in. She'll do whatever it takes to protect her nephew, even if it means causing a little chaos and a lot of fighting in the meantime.or:Chris goes to Texas and, in the process, learns more about his dad than he ever knew. Adriana and Sophia meddle in their bother's life, gain another brother in the process, and shatter some relationships beyond repair.

Author: FreckledAdvocate

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,376Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 69

Summary: A young man wearing nothing but bright pink sparkly boy shorts is kneeling over their patient with a finger pressed under his chin monitoring his pulse.“63 year old male, experienced a transient cardiac event. He was unconscious for about a minute before CPR brought him back. Probably an arrhythmia triggered by adrenaline.”Eddie nods and goes to move around the man to address the patient directly, when Ravi throws him completely out of step with a single word.“Buck?!”What? What?!“Ah, fuck.” Buck curses, “Of course they sent the 118.”-------------OR--------------Eddie is working a rare rotation on B-shift and heard that A-shift had a rough week in his absence. He's looking forward to having Buck over later to make sure he's okay after a few bad losses on the job. He wasn't planning on running into him half naked, surrounded by terrifying kinky equipment, triaging someone who played a little too hard at one of LA's BDSM sex clubs. Eddie's about to go through a whole bunch of self-discoveries, not all of them kink related.
